name: music-aac-downloader
description: Download YouTube's music/playlist on AAC format

scripts.install_depends: npm run client_depends && npm run server_depends
scripts.run_client_server: npm run client && npm run server
scripts.start: npm install && npm run install_depends && concurrently "npm run client" "npm run server"
scripts.build: npm run install_depends && cd client && npm run build
